amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $125,000 from being used for the Defense Procurement Assistance Program of the Economic Growth Connection of Westmoreland in Greensburg, Pennsylvania, and reduce the amount of section 511 of the bill by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 111-208 to prohibit $125,000 from being used for the Defense Procurement Assistance Program of the Economic Growth Connection of Westmoreland in Greensburg, Pennsylvania, and reduce the amount of section 511 of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 312 (Roll no. 566).
